docs.lead_paragraph: It's long been known that oral health is an important indicator for the body's overall health. Now new research suggests gum disease may predict whether you develop diabetes.
docs.abstract: The health of your mouth appears to influence your body's overall health.
docs.snippet: The health of your mouth appears to influence your body's overall health.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Giants will begin their quest for another ring when they play the Lions in Detroit on Thursday night in the first of their four exhibition games.

headline.main: Coming Off Title, Giants Are Ready to Start Over

docs.lead_paragraph: 10 P.M. (ABC) CHINA INSIDE OUT: BOB WOODRUFF REPORTS At a time when American foreign policy has been focused primarily on combating terrorism, China has been immersed in making global deals and generating great wealth. In this ''Primetime'' episode Mr. Woodruff (above left, conducting an interview) returns to China and also travels to Angola, Brazil, Cambodia and back to the United States in search of examples of how China is using its growing power and influence to form crucial political and economic alliances. 8 P.M. (Discovery) NEXTWORLD This new series looks ahead to technological marvels that could have us living like the Jetsons, starting with the floating cities and teleportation devices imagined in this premiere episode.
docs.snippet: 10 P.M. (ABC) CHINA INSIDE OUT: BOB WOODRUFF REPORTS  At a time when American foreign policy has been focused primarily on combating terrorism, China has been immersed in making global deals and generating great wealth.  In this ''Primetime'' episode...

docs.lead_paragraph: Sue Makin , the newest contributor to this blog, is an American Presbyterian missionary doctor working at a 190-bed mission hospital in southern Malawi. She has been working in Africa for the past 18 years. According to a 2007 study of global maternal mortality rates, more than two-thirds of deaths among Malawian women of reproductive age are linked to pregnancy or childbirth - a larger proportion than in any of the 171 countries in the study.
docs.abstract: A veteran aid worker makes a plea: Don't send junk to Africa! Instead, make sure donations match needs.
docs.snippet: A veteran aid worker makes a plea: Don't send junk to Africa! Instead, make sure donations match needs.

docs.lead_paragraph: A new textbook is the first guidebook of new techniques for American battlefield surgeons to be published while the wars it analyzes are still being fought.

headline.seo: New Textbook for Surgeons in the Battlefield Makes It Past the Army's Censors
headline.sub: A guide for battlefield surgeons clears the Army’s censors.;

docs.snippet: A new textbook is the first guidebook of new techniques for American battlefield surgeons to be published while the wars it analyzes are still being fought.

docs.lead_paragraph: In Kaija Saariaho’s bleakly humane piece at the Santa Fe Opera, striking details in its multilayered music come through with uncanny clarity.

headline.seo: ‘Adriana Mater’ at Santa Fe: Compassion, Not Revenge, After a Rape in a War Zone
